about_the_game:
Dear Cultivators,

As you journey on the path of cultivation, pushing boundaries and exploring the unknown, have you felt a ripple of energy from the mysterious beyond? We are thrilled to announce the release of our latest DLC, "Invasion of the Monster Sect," bringing unprecedented mystery and challenges to your cultivation world!

The Rise of the Monster Disciples, A Tremor of Heaven and Earth

The ancient Monster rises again—what are their motives? Are they a threat or an opportunity? Amidst the surge of yao energy, you will witness the collision between the cultivation world and the Monster Disciples, experiencing a journey filled with danger and allure.

Introducing a New Character: Monster Cultivator

As you interact with the Monster disciples, new cultivation practices emerge. Transform enemies into allies and integrate the new Monster Cultivator character. Master the power of monster essence, unlocking unique talents and skills that redefine the traditional cultivation framework.

Expanded Game World and Maps

The mysterious Monster Realm is now open, featuring unique beasts and magical maps awaiting your exploration. Conquer obstacles and uncover secrets hidden within.

Exclusive Missions and Generous Rewards

Participate in thrilling time-limited events, complete exclusive missions, and earn generous cultivation rewards and precious Monster artifacts to enhance your cultivation journey.

This DLC contains the following content

1、 New Sect Force

  • Tiger Sect

  • Wolf Sect

2、 Unique Traits

  • Werewolf

  • Grim

  • Nippy

  • Self Healing

  • Frenzied

  • Tiger God

  • Beast King

  • Patient

  • Tiger Raid

  • Strong Mind

3、 New Arts of Spell

  • Wolf Howl (greatly enhances Critical attribute)

  • Tiger Roar (greatly enhancing Strength attributes)

4、 New World Mission Event

When reaching a specific stage in the game, a new world task will be triggered, and completing the task will result in rewards and even new disciples joining the sect.

However, this is not a sign of peace, but rather a portal for demons from another world to enter this place. They pair up in groups to conquer the entire world.
